examples: Lindera henanensis H.P.Tsui in Acta Phytotax. Sin. 25(6): 412 (1987).
source: from 'A Dictionary of the Families and Genera of Chinese Seed Plants' ed How Foon-chew (1982). Alternataive transliteration from Acta Bot. Yunnanica,  16(1): 29 (1994). Date of birth from Index Herb. Sin.: 190 (1993). Date of death  from Fl. China, 16: page opposite contents page.
